Revolutionize Your Software Delivery with FlexTweak’s DevOps

We provide a comprehensive suite of DevOps services from start to finish, enabling you to improve efficiency, automate workflows, eliminate human errors during development and operations processes, and accelerate your time-to-market.

Our top Cloud experts will create well-designed CI/CD pipelines for your business using the best DevOps solutions, including Kubernetes, Jenkins, Terraform, Docker, and more.

DevOps as a Service Advantages

DevOps as a Service is the most cost-efficient way to accelerate high-quality product delivery, improve collaboration between development and operations teams, and gain a competitive edge.

Acceleration

DevOps as a Service provides one seamless workflow for software delivery, eliminating toil, accelerating time-to-market, and reducing waste to improve product quality.

Efficiency

Agile transformation delivers 30% gains in efficiency, customer satisfaction, employee engagement, and operational productivity, eliminating manual processes.

Security

DevSecOps increases network activity visibility, transparency, and overall security at every stage of the SDLC to deliver robust applications and services at high velocity.

Reliability

SRE services benefit any business, ensuring automation, reliability, and scaling during peak times and providing a seamless and consistent development environment.

Performance

DevOps improves performance and increases customer satisfaction, implementing automated monitoring of customer feedback, continuous analytics, and frequent updates.

Cost Reduction

Best DevOps tools and cloud services save maintenance costs and eliminate unnecessary capital expenditures to help businesses get a much faster investment return.

FlexTweak is Your TrustedDevOps as a Service Provider

FlexTweak provides DevOps services and solutions to automate workflows with custom tools targeted to your business needs. With FlexTweak, you have reliable DevOps partner at your side to enhance your SDLC.

  • CI/CD
  • IaC
  • Microservices
  • Kubernetes (K8s)
  • Monitoring
  • Security

Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment

FlexTweak’s well-architected Continuous Integration (CI) pipelines automatically build and test your code every time it’s written to detect failures and bugs in the earliest stages.

FlexTweak’s well-designed Continuous Deployment (CD) pipelines deploy the code in various environments to gain early feedback every time the product is built and passes the testing procedure.

Infrastructure as Code

FlexTweak’s DevOps engineers provide state-of-the-art infrastructure management that involves automatic environment provisioning, a monitoring program with relevant alerts, and autoscaling.

Our DevOps strategy draws on the best technologies to help teams rapidly deploy new software and maintain an enhanced experience for customers even during product updates and changes.

Microservice Architecture

At FlexTweak, we offer cutting-edge microservice solutions that guarantee flexibility and scalability for your software. We understand the importance of improving time-to-market and simplifying processes, which is why we use a deployment automation strategy to help you achieve these goals.

With our microservice architecture, you won’t have to worry about extending the entire system or the failure of a single module affecting the whole infrastructure.

Kubernetes (K8s)

As a certified container orchestration service provider, FlexTweak offers top-notch Kubernetes consulting, implementation, migration, automation, and DevOps support services.

Our certified tech experts make it easy to build, manage, and operate Kubernetes-based solutions tailored to meet your business demands.

Continuous Monitoring

At FlexTweak, we know that real-time feedback is essential for security and operations analysts. That’s why we provide well-architected continuous monitoring services to ensure that your IT infrastructure, including networks and applications deployed in the cloud, is always performing at its best.

Our DevOps professionals increase visibility and mitigate cyber-attack risks with a timely alert system that triggers a rapid incident response.

Continuous Security

Cloud environments are one of the biggest blind spots in the overall attack facet. That’s why we at FlexTweak focus on building security into the SDLC at the early stages to leverage excellent DevSecOps practices for seamless process integration, better security, and compliance at lower costs.
